about_the_game:
No docs. No tutorial. No escape.

Tackle an evolving spectrum of puzzles within a simulated computer system using only terminal commands. Inspired by a bad day with a package manager.

WELCOME, [APPLICANT_NAME]

This evaluation has been designed to assess your knowledge and reasoning skills, critical components for securing a position at PRAET.

KEY POINTS

  • SCORING: Achieving a high score significantly enhances your prospects for employment with PRAET. Conversely, failure will result in immediate disqualification from the recruitment process.¹
  • TIME ALLOCATION: While there is no official time limit, the average applicant completes this scenario within 4 hours.²
  • OBJECTIVE: Your primary objective in this scenario is to SUCCESSFULLY EXECUTE THE ESCAPE COMMAND.
¹Recruiters forfeit their referral bonus for any dismissed applicants. (See form FB-6 ¶B612 or contact recruitment HR for details)
²Applicants are required to provide their own sustenance during the evaluation. (See form FB-2 ¶B6254)

Good luck.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
  • Processor: 2GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 capable GPU
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 or higher display is required.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
  • Processor: 2GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 capable GPU
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 or higher display is required.

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 capable GPU
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 or higher display is required.
